ada dina sidukala katha, pipirimata niyamitha bhu-deshapalanika wedibeheth gabadawak pilibanda sawistharathmaka pahadili kirimak idiripath karayi: gambauruwana aarthika arbudaya hamuwe lokaya pura banku apadim ha “pa්ramanathmaka lihil kirime” piyawara thulin dawantha samapekshana bubulu godanagi atha; yuropaya thula uga්ra bhu-deshapalana gatum ha nagenahira yuropaye militarikaranaya; “aasiyawata harima” amarikawa chinaya samaga gatumaka patalawa atha; indiyawa ha pakisthanaya athara aathathin; madaperadiga pa්radeshiya yuddhaya; anagathaye aparadha sandaha sudanam wimata ithihasaya aluthen liwimath samaga athwal bandagath jarmaniye japanaye yali militarikaranaya; lathin amarikawe ha apa්rikawe amarikawa ha chinaya athara pananagi thibena aathathiya; adhirajyawadaye aparadha walin pana beraganimata pala yana sanka්ramanikayinta ella kerena bihisunu pa්rahara; jathikawadi ha fasistwadi pa්rathigamithwaye wardhanaya; lowa pura kamkaru panthiyata erehi akhanda kappadu wimasa baluni.

mage kalin postuwen man kiwwane hithin henata wayasa giya eeth thama nattata kiri urapuwath nathi kollek pora wenna yana eka gana.mans man ee postuwa dala dawas dekathunakma yanakan bukiyewath blog walawath ahata dakke na.anika mans ee post ekata kament karalath na, ee mokada ee man kiyapu dewal mansta boru kiyala oppu karanna bari nisa.man hithuwa minihath kello belle wala dagannawa wage bellewala dagaththada wath kiyala, eeth eeye idala mans onna aayeth karaliyata bahala.onna ada ape mahacharya thumage boge kament karapu ayata ripliyi karala sanwadayak godanagala.aaye ithin ee wena mokatawath neme pinwathuni ohuge porathwaya ismathu karaganna thama ee.mans paya gahannema blog loke porawal kiyala hanwadu gahila thiyana bogawal asse thama, eewa asse gihin raganawa ambanaka kattiya athare janapriya wenna, thama porathwaya ismathu karaganna.dan ithin samahara un kiyayi man me irisiyawata kiyana katha kiyala.ane man mokata irisiya karandada aayubowanda math me ada eeye methanata pahala una aththek neme.math meka kala hodata wathura bipu manussayek.
